<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expand Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=5899) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 95 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
champion’s aura

</column>

---

You focus your divine power to extend your influence and protection. Expand the radius of your champion's aura to 30 feet until the start of your next turn. At 10th level, the expansion lasts for 1 minute, and at 16th level, it lasts until you Dismiss it.
name: Expand Aura
